more.Name: Health Assessment
more.Summary: The Health Assessment IEPD was developed for the California Department of Justice - Data Exchange Project.
more.Description: A Health Assessment is sent from the probation department to the youth authority when the court has sentenced a subject to the youth authority and there has been a health assessment conducted on the subject.  The Health Assessment contains subject personal identification information, physical assessment information, and date/time.  The Health Assessment is one of 44 IEPDs developed by the California Department of Justice - Data Exchange Project to support information exchange between state and local government organizations throughout the state of California.  It could also be adapted for use in other states.
more.Status: IEPD HealthAssmt complete and ready for implementation
more.ExchangePartners: California state and local criminal justice agencies
more.Process: When the court sentences a subject to the youth authority and a health assessment has been completed by the probation department, the probation department forwards the health assessment form to the youth authority.
more.Conditions: When a health assessment has been completed by the probation department and the subject is sentenced to the youth authority, the health assessment form is forwarded to the youth authority
more.Sponsors: California Department of Justice and other California state and local criminal justice agencies - see master documentation
more.Purpose: To provide subjects' health assessment information to the youth authority.
more.ExchangePartnerCategories: California state and local criminal justice agencies
